Package index

All functions

check_collinearity_with_time()
Check for collinearity between fixed effects and time variable
check_perfect_separation()
Check for perfect separation in categorical fixed effects
compute_normalization_factors()
Compute normalization factors
compute_p_values()
Compute p-values for each target_id
convert_to_long_format()
Convert count matrix to long format and join with experiment design
estimate_changepoint()
Use model selection to estimate changepoints
estimate_dispersions()
Estimate dispersions for count data
estimate_dispersions_wrapper()
Wrapper for estimating dispersions
exp_design
Example Experimental Design
filter_and_update_data()
Filter and update data_long with normalization factors
handle_gene_aggregation()
Handle gene aggregation in long format data
import_count_data()
Import count data from files
plot_cluster()
Plot clustered targets
plot_cpam()
Plot fitted changepoint additive models
plot_gene_co()
Plot a fitted cpgam (superseded)
prepare_case_control()
Prepare case-control data by adding case indicator
prepare_cpam()
Prepare a cpam object
process_bootstrap_data()
Process bootstrap data
process_count_matrix()
Process count matrix when importing is not needed
results()
Create a results table from a cpam object
select_shape()
Use model selection to select a shape for each target
summarise_bootstraps()
Summarize bootstrap samples
t2g
Transcript-to-Gene Mapping
ts_filter()
Removes lowly expressed genes
validate_cores()
Validate and adjust number of cores
validate_fixed_effects()
Validate fixed effects formula against experimental design
validate_inputs()
Validate input parameters for prepare_cpam
visualize()
Launches a Shiny app to visualise the data and fitted models of a cpam object
